{8536,7600,10629,8536,7600,10629,8536,7600,10629,8536,7600,10629},
{8569,7600,10645,8569,7600,10645,8569,7600,10645,8569,7600,10645},
{8602,7600,10662,8602,7600,10662,8602,7600,10662,8602,7600,10662},
{8636,7600,10678,8636,7600,10678,8636,7600,10678,8636,7600,10678},
{8671,7600,10695,8671,7600,10695,8671,7600,10695,8671,7600,10695},
{8705,7600,10711,8705,7600,10711,8705,7600,10711,8705,7600,10711},
{8740,7600,10727,8740,7600,10727,8740,7600,10727,8740,7600,10727},
{8776,7600,10742,8776,7600,10742,8776,7600,10742,8776,7600,10742},
{8811,7600,10758,8811,7600,10758,8811,7600,10758,8811,7600,10758},
{8848,7600,10774,8848,7600,10774,8848,7600,10774,8848,7600,10774},
{8884,7600,10789,8884,7600,10789,8884,7600,10789,8884,7600,10789}
};


unsigned short servo_position(unsigned char id,int pos)
{
    tx[0] = 0x80|id;
    tx[1] = (unsigned char)((pos & mask_h)>>7);
    tx[2] = (unsigned char)(pos & mask_l);
    wait_ms(2);
    for(i=0;i<3;i++)
    {
        serial_servo.putc(tx[i]);
    }
    return 0;
}

unsigned short servo_speed(unsigned char id,int speed)
{
        tx[0] = 0xC0|id;
        tx[1] = 0x02;
        tx[2] = 0x00|speed;
        wait_ms(2);
        for(i=0;i<3;i++)
        {
            serial_servo.putc(tx[i]);
        }
        return 0;
}

//電流値の読み込み
unsigned short servo_current(unsigned char id,int current)
{
        tx[0] = 0xC0|id;
        tx[1] = 0x03;
        //tx[2] = 0x00|speed;
        wait_ms(2);
        for(i=0;i<3;i++)
        {
            serial_servo.putc(tx[i]);
        }
        
        rx[0] = serial_servo.getc();
        rx[1] = serial_servo.getc();
        rx[2] = serial_servo.getc();
        rx[3] = serial_servo.getc();
        rx[4] = serial_servo.getc();
        
        return 0;
}

void pc_command()
{
    ch = pc.getc();
    pc.putc(ch);
}

void close_motion()
{
    for(j=1;j<13;j++){
        servo_speed(j,30);
    }
    servo_position(1,10167);
    servo_position(4,10167);
    servo_position(7,10167);
    servo_position(10,10167);
    
    servo_position(2,7600);
    servo_position(5,7600);
    servo_position(8,7600);
    servo_position(11,7600);
    
    servo_position(3,11500);
    servo_position(6,11500);
    servo_position(9,11500);
    servo_position(12,11500);
    wait_ms(2000);
    
    servo_position(2,4933);
    servo_position(5,4933);
    servo_position(8,4933);
    servo_position(11,4933);
}

void open_motion()
{
    for(j=1;j<13;j++){
        servo_speed(j,50);
    }
    servo_position(2,7600);
    servo_position(5,7600);
    servo_position(8,7600);
    servo_position(11,7600);
    wait_ms(500);
    
    servo_position(3,10294);
    servo_position(6,10294);
    servo_position(9,10294);
    servo_position(12,10294);
    wait_ms(60);
    
    servo_position(1,8820);
    servo_position(4,8820);
    servo_position(7,8820);
    servo_position(10,8820);
    wait_ms(100);
    
    while(open_count<open_max){
        servo_position(10,open[open_count][0]);
        servo_position(11,open[open_count][1]);
        servo_position(12,open[open_count][2]);
        servo_position(1,open[open_count][3]);
        servo_position(2,open[open_count][4]);
        servo_position(3,open[open_count][5]);
        servo_position(7,open[open_count][6]);
        servo_position(8,open[open_count][7]);
        servo_position(9,open[open_count][8]);
        servo_position(4,open[open_count][9]);
        servo_position(5,open[open_count][10]);
        servo_position(6,open[open_count][11]);
        open_count++;
    }
    open_count=0;
}

void slope_motion()
{
    for(j=1;j<13;j++){
        servo_speed(j,70);    //クロール
        //servo_speed(j,100);      //間歇クロール 1~127 ここ関係ない
    }
    while(slope_count<slope_max){
        servo_position(10,slope[slope_count][0]);
        servo_position(11,slope[slope_count][1]);
        servo_position(12,slope[slope_count][2]);
        servo_position(1,slope[slope_count][3]);
        servo_position(2,slope[slope_count][4]);
        servo_position(3,slope[slope_count][5]);
        servo_position(7,slope[slope_count][6]);
        servo_position(8,slope[slope_count][7]);
        servo_position(9,slope[slope_count][8]);
        servo_position(4,slope[slope_count][9]);
        servo_position(5,slope[slope_count][10]);
        servo_position(6,slope[slope_count][11]);
        slope_count++;
    }
    slope_count=0;
}

int main()
{
    wait_ms(500);
    serial_servo.baud(115200);
    serial_servo.format(8,Serial::Even,1);
    
    pc.baud(115200);
    pc.format(8,Serial::None,1);
    
    pc.printf("key:");
    pc.attach(pc_command,Serial::RxIrq);
    
    while(1)
    {
        switch(ch)
        {
            case 'c':
            close_motion();
            wait_ms(20);
            ch = 0;
            flag_close = ON;
            flag_open = OFF;
            break;
                
            case 'o':
            if(flag_close == ON)
            {
                open_motion();
                wait_ms(20);
                flag_close = OFF;
                flag_open = ON;
            }
            ch = 0;
            break;
            
            case 'w':
            if(flag_open == ON)
            {
                while(n<1){ //2は実行回数
                    slope_motion();
                    wait_ms(20);    //20
                    n++;
                }
                n=0;
            }
            ch = 0;
            break;
            
            default:
            break;
        }
    }
}
